remarks: The logarithm of the quotient of two positive real numbers is the difference of logarithms.  Property 3 of [Cohen4] p. 361.  (Contributed by AV, 29-May-2020.)
statement: relogbdiv $p |- ( ( B e. ( CC \ { 0 , 1 } ) /\ ( A e. RR+ /\ C e. RR+ ) ) -> ( B logb ( A / C ) ) = ( ( B logb A ) - ( B logb C ) ) ) $.
